short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that exports Claude chat history as Markdown text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üì¢ Notice
This is only used to export Claude AI chat conversations. If you need to export ChatGPT, please use ExportGPT (https://chatopenai.pro/exportgpt/). If you need to adapt to more websites, please go to Web2Markdown plugin (https://chatopenai.pro/web2markdown/) to submit a feature request.

‚öíÔ∏è Tips for use
1. Open the Claude chat page and chat with Claude
https://claude.ai/
2. Click the Markdown icon in the upper right corner of the page to open the `Claude to Markdown` operation panel
3. Click the button at the bottom of the panel to copy the text or download the Markdown text
4. You can edit the Markdown text as needed, and then copy or download
5. The popup window supports setting whether to automatically close the sidebar after export, and whether to insert metadata

üîó Links
- All-in-one ChatGPT conversation export plugin - ExportGPT: https://chatopenai.pro/exportgpt
- Export any web content to Markdown format - Web2Markdown: https://chatopenai.pro/web2markdown/

üôã Feedback
Any questions or BUG submissions, please contact https://chatopenai.pro/
